column4: Can any one help me with getting beryl install on ubuntu 7.10? I've install ubuntu about 5 time today.
beryl no longer is relevant. beryl and compiz merged to become compiz-fusion
ok im try to install the compiz thing but it will not let me enable the visual effects
well, that has to do with your video card driver
I have a ati 9800 and i've let ubuntu install the driver and it did not work plus i've downloaded the ones from ATI and i get the same thing
any way you can private msg me
no. I don't know much about getting fglrx working on ATI cards
i've tried that and no luck with enable the visual effects
im rdy to pull my hair out lol
it's just eye candy? If you just want eye candy, get a caleidoscope :)
I got sick of being unable to use my ATI card with compiz, so I went out and bought an nvidia
yeah guess that is what i will do
any suggest on VC that is easy to run it with
I have an EVGA 8600 at work, and an EVGA 7600 at home - both worked with no tweaking
so after the install you could just enable the effects
I installed, the "restricted drivers are available" thing popped up, clicked it, enabled, restarted and compiz was working
